immediateReliefPage.acupressureDescription: Acupressure uses finger pressure on specific points to relieve pain. It's based on Holistic Health principles and supported by modern research.

acupoints.name: Sanyinjiao (SP6)
acupoints.method: Press firmly for 1-2 minutes, circular motion

acupoints.name: Taichong (LV3)
acupoints.location: Top of foot, between big toe and second toe

technique.title: Massage Technique Guide:
technique.precautions: Avoid SP6 during pregnancy. Stop if pain increases.

immediateReliefPage.otcOptionsDescription: NSAIDs (Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs) like ibuprofen are highly effective for menstrual pain. They work by blocking prostaglandin production.
